0.15 - 2012-06-28
 - Backwards-incompatible changes to settings. See SETTINGS_AND_METADATA.txt.
 - Added support for IdP-initiated deep-links.
 - Small bug-fixes.

0.14 - 2011-10-12
 - Simplified test cases for Processors.
 - Made BaseProcessor respect SAML2IDP_SIGNING setting.

0.13 - 2011-10-11
 - Add i18n support for strings in templates.

0.12 - 2011-10-06
 - Include tests package in egg.

0.11 - 2011-10-05
 - Include templates in egg.


0.1 - Tagged 0.1.
